name: Aiden´s Lost Memories
description:
"What a weird dream...

This Quote starts the Adventure from Aiden, along his side his Pal Soran.

Since the memorieloss, Aiden suffers from nightmares, which reminds him who he once was. And Soran watching over him follows him and helps him with more or less good tips...

 <--Aiden                 Soran--> 

Since this is a crazy looking fantasy world named Noitendard you noitice the pretty much pink, purpel and blue scenerie.
As you play Aiden you can find flowers and butterflies you can collect.

You can play this Game via Keyboard and Mouse or use a Controller your Choice :)

                                  Controls                              

Keyboard & Mouse

A/D = Move

Space = Jump & double Jump

W = Glide

Shift + A/D = Sprint

Credits

Drawn with Aseprite

Sound & Music by weloveindies

Made with Unity
